images.prompt: A raw, ultra-realistic 8k photograph of a stunningly beautiful, young Japanese model, embodying a top-tier gravure idol aesthetic. She’s wearing a cropped, ivory silk camisole delicately laced at the bust, paired with high-waisted, light-wash denim shorts – the fabric subtly hugging her fit, curvy figure. Her straight, black, silky hair cascades around her shoulders. The setting is a sun-drenched, minimalist Tokyo cafe with large windows; blurred bokeh highlights dancing light. She’s holding a partially-drunk strawberry matcha latte, glancing directly into the camera with intense, captivating eyes, a slight, playful smile hinting at seduction. Flawless yet realistic skin texture – visible pores, faint vellus hair – enhances the realism. Shot on Sony A7R IV, 85mm f/1.4 GM lens, emphasizing depth of field, ray tracing and global illumination for exquisite detail and light.8k photo, Large breasts, deep cleavage, ample cleavage, sexy photo, beautilful girl without makeup
